doc.title: Mariah Mundi and the Midas Box
doc.plot: "Mariah Mundi and the Midas Box" is the first film in the series based on the novels by the New York Times bestselling author GP Taylor. When fifteen year old Mariah Mundi leaves the Chiswick Colonial School in London with a third class ticket and a first class suit, he begins a new life at the mysterious Prince Regent. The majestic hotel sits on the edge of a cliff in a northern seaside town at the end of the railway line. But beneath the luxurious hotel floors lurks a secret world filled with sea witches, labyrinths of tunnels, blood thirsty creatures, shady villains, and a magical box that turns everyday objects to gold. Will Mariah live to tell the tale of his adventures or will he succumb to the curse of the Prince Regent?
